memberdef.definition: std::function<void(const FeedPost&, const juce::String& emoji)> PostCard::onEmojiReaction
memberdef.name: onEmojiReaction

briefdescription.para: Set the post data to display.
Update the like count and liked state.

parameterdescription.para: Whether the current user has liked this post

briefdescription.para: Update the follow state for the post author.

parameterdescription.para: Whether the current user is following the author
The emoji reaction (empty string to clear)

briefdescription.para: Set whether the post is currently playing.
Set whether the post is currently playing (alias).

parameterdescription.para: true if loading audio, false otherwise

briefdescription.para: Timer callback for animations and long-press detection.
PostCard displays a single post in the feed.

detaileddescription.para:
Features:
User avatar with circular clip and fallback to initials
Username and relative timestamp
Waveform visualization with play progress overlay
Play/pause button
BPM and key badges
Like button with count
Comment count indicator
Share button
The component uses a callback-based API for actions to keep it decoupled from network/audio code.
